channel.title: Regression on Peter Elliott
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on Peter Elliott

item.title: Linear Regression
item.description: Linear Regression is a foundational topic in Statistics and Machine Learning. Countless books have been written on the topic, ranging from theory to tips for practitioners. In this post I aim to answer a few important questions: What is regression? What does it mean for it to be linear? How does it work? What can we learn when using Linear Regression? When should we be skeptical of results? What is Regression?
